programme.title: CYC TV
programme.desc: Christian Youth Channel - CYC aka Coptic Youth Channel, is a television and internet based English Coptic Orthodox Channel. CYC is the first English Coptic Christian channel, dedicated to Christians all around the world to spread the teachings and love of Jesus Christ. CYC looks to spread the word and life of Christ all through the world in a way that is compatible with today’s media consumption methods.

programme.title: CTV
programme.desc: CTV is the official channel of the Coptic Orthodox Church, run under the care and blessings of our Supreme Pontiff, His Holiness Pope Shenouda III, Pope of Alexandria and Patriarch of the See of St. Mark, may the Lord prolong his life for many years and healthy, safe eras.The channel presents all manner of art and television programs which reflect the original proper Orthodox faith and the Church's message, founded on love and peace within a framework of professional international media, which occasioned its enormous success. قناة سي تي في هي القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية، تحت رعاية قداسة البابا المعظم الأنبا تواضروس الثاني، بابا الإسكندرية وبطريرك الكرازة المرقسية، أدام الله رئاسته لنا سنينًا عديدة وأزمنة سلامية هادئة مديدة. وتقوم القناة بتقديم كافة أنواع الفنون والبرامج التليفزيونية التي تعكس أصالة وجوهر وسلامة العقيدة الأرثوذكسية ورسالة الكنيسة القائمة على المحبة والسلام في إطار من الحرفية الإعلامية.

programme.title: MESat TV
programme.desc: ME Sat TV, is a Christian Orthodox channel; aims to serve Christians worldwide through the broadcast of spiritual, social and health-related programmes. قناة مى سات، القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية تنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

programme.title: Logos TV
programme.desc: Logos TV is a Christian Orthodox channel; its message is testimony to our good Lord Jesus Christ according to our Orthodox faith. The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..

The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..

programme.title: El Maqar TV
programme.desc: El Maqar TV - A Coptic TV Channel under the see of H.H. Pope Tawadros II and his partner in the service H.G. Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

programme.desc: A distinctively emotional round of mood-enhancing songs. حناجر ذهبية تؤدي أجمل الأغنيات التي تناسب كل الأذواق والأمزجة.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Arabic hits that simply strike the right note for a fulfilling musical experience. أشهر الأغاني العربية المصورة التي تناسب جميع الأذواق وتلعب على أوتار القلب فتارة يذوب حناناً ورقة، وطوراً تتسارع دقاته مع الإيقاع فيفيض حيوية وبهجة.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Free TV is the Number One Music channel in Lebanon. In addition to airing the largest number of latest hits and exclusive music videos, Free TV also produces different entertainment shows all of which are directly related to music and celebrities. قناة فري تي-في هي الوجهة الأولى للموسيقى في لبنان، وبالإضافة إلى بث أكبر عدد من أنجح الأغاني الحديثة، تقوم القناة بإنتاج العديد من البرامج الترفيهية المرتبطة مباشرة بالموسيقى ومشاهير عالم الفن.

programme.desc: The squad tries to get a Mustang resurrected for the owner's wife while also struggling to get the GTO street legal.

programme.desc: A Mustang was once a father-son project, but the project stalled and now the car hasn't run in 20 years. The guys systematically go through everything that needs to be fixed, and hopefully, they'll get this pony running again.

programme.title: Two Guys Garage
programme.desc: Automotive experts share their expertise on a variety of automotive tech issues.

programme.title: Speed Is the New Black
programme.desc: More than 40 years since totaling a 1971 Chevelle a new client is ready to rebuild his first dream car. Starting from a bare frame, the crew begins the process of giving this Chevelle a new life, one that will turn heads at shows, and on the road.

programme.desc: With new demands from their client, the Classic Car team fight to finish the 1971 Chevelle reinvention into a modern day super car. A new look, Ferrari inspired custom touches, and a new power plant make this a true, one of a kind Chevelle.

programme.title: Speed Is the New Black
programme.desc: A massive horsepower upgrade makes a Mini one huge beast for a lover of small cars and fast speeds. Noah and the team rebuild her 1972 Mini so she can race her boyfriend and enjoy zippy rides on country drives.

programme.desc: A Doctor wants a fun ride when not in the operating room, and asks Noah to take his Chevy SSR and turn it into a mean yet classy freak on wheels. The team re-imagines this mash-up and transforms the SSR into a powerful and aggressive new ride.

programme.desc: A new client longs for her high school glory days and tasks Classic Car Studio with restoring her 1965 Cadillac El Dorado to its original 60's style while adding much needed modern technology.

programme.desc: The brief this time is for the car that Porsche would have built if they'd been building electric sports cars in the 1970s. Moggy and his team pull out all the stops to create the ultimate electric Porsche 914 conversion.

programme.desc: This 1967 Nova nostalgia funny car has been lost in mechanical limbo for over 4 years. As a memorial to the owner's late father, the Garage Squad tries to help him achieve his dream of taking it down the track.

programme.desc: The Martins face the physics conundrum of trying to fit a 6'5" former football player into the cab of a 1967 Chevy C10. This tall order requires customization of the firewall, motor, frame and interior, plus a custom paint job.

programme.title: Two Guys Garage
programme.desc: This beautiful LS-converted 1968 Firebird has risen from the ashes, but the owner needs a little help getting the project going again. The guys jump in and lend a hand by adding some key components to help get it flying down the road again.

programme.title: Two Guys Garage
programme.desc: Kevin and Willie take a brand new 2020 Jeep Gladiator and outfit it with all the bells and whistles it needs to make it one awesome street machine.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Wayne finds himself with, not one, but TWO epic finds on his hands. First, he discovers a 1947 Alfa Romeo 6C 2500 Super Sport Cabriolet that's been garaged for over 30 years. Then, he gets a fully-loaded, single-owner 1948 Harley Davidson with a sidecar.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Wayne's after a 1958 SAAB GT 750 that has been perfectly restored. When he arrives to inspect and test drive the Saab, he learns that the owner has two more Saabs he could potentially sell.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Wayne finds a late fifties Stanguellini Monoposto Formula Junior race car for sale. He jumps at the chance to buy it and bring it back to the shop to surprise Roger. Meanwhile, Wayne hopes to sell two cars to make room in the garage for a 1953 Bandini.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Two winning race cars and a high-tech hybrid supercar are calling Wayne to the track. Between them, they share more than 100 years of racing and automotive engineering.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: A perfect pair of early sixties Volkswagen Karmann Ghias has Wayne reaching for his check book and Roger giving the cars his 'special treatment' when he bets Wayne he can get one of the cars running in eight minutes or less.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Wayne throws open a garage to discover a trio of Zagato-bodied, Fiat-Abarth 750s including two coveted Double Bubbles and a low production Record Monza. Then he's on the hunt for a 1954 Kaiser Manhattan; one of less than 5,000 produced.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Ruby's Diner in the King of Prussia Mall closes its doors and the owners have to sell three vintage America motorcycles in a hurry: a Harley Davidson, an Indian and a Triumph. At F40, the crew's working on an '86 Lambo that hasn't been driven in 25 years.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Wayne has been commissioned to sell a very unique 1968 Superbird. When the EPA tested airplane emissions in the 1970's they looked no further than NASCAR and the Plymouth Superbird to race the jets down the runway.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Wayne goes from coast to coast to add to his collection when he buys a Sprint Midget race car complete with a custom trailer, a vintage '36 Ford Pickup truck to tow them and matching Quarter Midget race car to ride along in the truck bed.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Wayne's been contacted by the New York Governor's office to refresh Franklin Delano Roosevelt's '32 Packard. Governor Cuomo wants to see it brought back to life after sitting in a state museum for decades.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Wayne's always dreamed of owning an iconic Auburn Boattail Speedster. A twist of fate connects him with 2 sisters selling their grandfather's collection, including a '32 Auburn Boattail Speedster, a 1909 Ford Model T, and more.

programme.desc: Wayne and car-buddy, Ralph, head to the VSCCA Wilbraham Hill Climb where it's Wayne's Stutz up against Ralph's Packard speedster in an old-fashioned drag race. With their pride, pink slips and a charity donation on the line, horsepower rules the day.
